title: Episode 56: The Fruits of Victory
description:
Does the Battle of Marengo deserve its reputation as one of Napoleon's greatest victories? We analyze the battle and examine its chaotic aftermath.
If you'd like to listen to the show ad-free, visit: https://www.patreon.com/ageofnapoleon and pledge at least $2/month. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
